thread.section_title: Saint James Albany Hotel-Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location walking distance of almost everywhere!
thread.title_full: Great location walking distance of almost everywhere! - Review of Saint James Albany Hotel-Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Di W
title: Great location walking distance of almost everywhere!
text:
We booked for one night, I asked for twin beds, all delivered, the hotel is very efficient and released, staff are approachable and nothing is too much trouble, lovely spa and pool plus we had a wonderful room that looked out over a quiet courtyard so could escape an city noise.
Great for a central base if you want to explore Paris on foot, beautiful gardens in front and plenty of shops and eateries close by!
